more_info.origin: Produced from seawater or salt. Natural minerals.
more_info.characteristics: Acidity regulators, alkali, and rising agent
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None, E500 can be used by all religious groups, vegans and vegetarians.

more_info.origin: Produced from potassiumchloride, a natural mineral.
more_info.characteristics: Acidity regulators, alkali, and rising agents
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None, E501 can be used by all religious groups, vegans and vegetarians.

more_info.characteristics: Acidity regulators, alkali, and rising agents
more_info.side_effects: None known, except some gas formation in the stomach after ingestion.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None, E503 can be used by all religious groups, vegans and vegetarians.

more_info.origin: Produced from magnesium hydroxide, but also occurs as a natural mineral.
more_info.characteristics: Acidity regulators, alkali, and anti-caking agents
more_info.side_effects: None known, except that high concentrations act as a laxative.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None, E504 can be used by all religious groups, vegans and vegetarians.

more_info.origin: It occurs as a natural mineral.
more_info.characteristics: Acidity regulator, but mainly used to fortify foods with iron.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None, 505 can be used by all religious groups, vegans and vegetarians.

more_info.origin: Natural acid, normal acid in the stomach. Produced from salt and sulphuric acid.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: All religious groups, vegans and vegetarians can use E507

more_info.origin: Natural salt, part of sea salt and rock salt.
more_info.side_effects: None known, except a bad flavour and taste.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: All religious groups, vegans and vegetarians can use E508

more_info.origin: Natural salt, part of sea salt and rock salt.
more_info.characteristics: Acidity regulator, enhances firmness in fruits and vegetables, binds metals.
more_info.products: Many products, also used as calcium source in nutrition supplements.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: All religious groups, vegans and vegetarians can use E509

more_info.origin: Natural salt, part of sea salt and rock salt. Prepared from hydrochloric acid and ammonia.
more_info.characteristics: Acidity regulator, flavour and nutrient for yeast in yeast-fermented products such as bread.
more_info.products: Many products, but due to strong taste use is limited.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: All religious groups, vegans and vegetarians can use 510.

more_info.origin: Natural salt, part of sea salt and rock salt.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: All religious groups, vegans and vegetarians can use E511

more_info.origin: Prepared from tin ores and hydrochloric acid.
more_info.side_effects: None known when used in foods.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: All religious groups, vegans and vegetarians can use E512

more_info.origin: Prepared from sulphur dioxide, oxygen and water
more_info.side_effects: None known when used in foods.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: All religious groups, vegans and vegetarians can use E513

more_info.origin: Prepared from salt and sulphuric acid.
more_info.side_effects: None known when used in foods.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: All religious groups, vegans and vegetarians can use E514

more_info.origin: Prepared from potassium salts and sulphuric acid. Natural mineral.
more_info.characteristics: Used for treatment of water used for brewing; salt replacer
more_info.side_effects: None known when used in foods.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: All religious groups, vegans and vegetarians can use E515

more_info.origin: Prepared from calcium salts and sulphuric acid. Natural mineral.
more_info.characteristics: Stabiliser, metal binding agent, nutrient for yeast in bread
more_info.side_effects: None known when used in foods.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: All religious groups, vegans and vegetarians can use E516

more_info.origin: Prepared from ammonium salts and sulphuric acid. Natural mineral.
more_info.side_effects: None known when used in foods.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: All religious groups, vegans and vegetarians can use E517

more_info.origin: Prepared from magnesium salts and sulphuric acid. Natural mineral.
more_info.characteristics: Nutritional supplement; enhances firmness in canned vegetables
more_info.side_effects: None known when used in foods, but it is a strong laxative.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: All religious groups, vegans and vegetarians can use 518

more_info.origin: Natural mineral, from which the commercial product is purified.
more_info.products: Beer, pickled vegetables, proteins (deodorant, as anti-bacterial agent)
more_info.side_effects: Aluminium inhibits the uptake of B-vitamins. It may also influence liver function in high concentrations. However with use of E520 the concentrations are too low.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E520 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Prepared from natural aluminium sulphate.
more_info.side_effects: Aluminium inhibits the uptake of B-vitamins. It may also influence liver function in high concentrations. However with use of E521 the concentrations are too low.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E521 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Prepared from natural aluminium sulphate.
more_info.side_effects: Aluminium inhibits the uptake of B-vitamins. It may also influence liver function in high concentrations. However with use of E523 the concentrations are too low.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E523 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Prepared from natural salt.
more_info.products: Many products, including bakery products, cocoa products, coffee creamer, black olives
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E524 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Prepared from the natural salt potassium chloride.
more_info.products: Bakery products, cocoa products, black olives and the colour annatto (E160b)
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E525 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Prepared from the natural salt calcium oxide.
more_info.products: Cheese, cocoa products, wine, nutmeg, sweet frozen products, dried fish
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E526 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Prepared from the ammonia and water.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E527 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Prepared from natural minerals.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E528 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Prepared from chalk.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E529 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Prepared from several minerals.
more_info.side_effects: Magnesium acts as a laxative in high concentrations.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E530 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Prepared from hydrogen ferrocyanide and sodium hydroxide.
more_info.side_effects: None in the concentrations used. Use is very limited, partly due to the strong yellow colour.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E535 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Prepared from hydrogen ferrocyanide and potassium hydroxide.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E536 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Prepared from hydrogen mangano-cyanide and iron hydroxide.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. 537 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Prepared from hydrogen ferrocyanide and calcium hydroxide.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E538 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Synthetic compound.
more_info.side_effects: Thiosulphate is converted into sulphite and has similar side effects, see  .
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. 539 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Salts of sodium/potassium/calcium with phosphates. All are produced synthetically from the respective carbonates and phosphoric acid.
more_info.characteristics: Buffers and emulsifiers. E450 (iii) also binds metals and prevents discoloration due to metals. E450 (vi) is also used as bread enhancer and calcium supplement.
more_info.daily_intake: Up to 70 mg/kg bodyweight for all phosphate containing additives
more_info.side_effects: None known when used in foods. High concentrations of phosphates may disturb several metabolic processes as phosphate plays an important role in general metabolism.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: E450 can be consumed by all religious groups, vegans and vegetarians.

more_info.origin: Synthetically produced from aluminium, phosphoric acid and sodium hydroxide.
more_info.side_effects: Aluminium impairs the calcium and phosphorous uptake by the body. The concentrations from E541 are generally so low that no effect is to be expected.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E541 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Produced from animal bones.
more_info.side_effects: Phosphates are normal essential salts for the body. In view of the need to avoid calcium deficiency, their use is limited, as they bind to calcium readily. They have no side effects.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: 542 can not be used by vegans, vegetarians, Muslims, Jews or Hindus. The product is made of animal bones, such as from pigs and cattle.

more_info.origin: Produced from sodium phosphate and calcium phosphate from non-animal origin.
more_info.side_effects: Polyphosphates may inhibit digestive enzymes in high concentrations.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. 543 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Produced by heating calcium phosphate.
more_info.side_effects: Polyphosphates may inhibit digestive enzymes in high concentrations.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. 544 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Produced by heating ammonium hydrogen phosphate.
more_info.side_effects: Polyphosphates may inhibit digestive enzymes in high concentrations.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. 545 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Produced by heating magnesiumphosphate.
more_info.side_effects: Phosphates are normal essential salts for the body. In view of the need to avoid calcium deficiency, their use is limited, as they bind to calcium readily. They have no side effects.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. 546 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Produced by heating siliciumdioxide (quartz, sand) and sodiumcarbonate.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. 550 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Produced from sand.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E551 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Produced from chalk and special sand.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E552 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Produced from magnesium sulphate and sodium silicate or directly from minerals such as talcum, sepiolite and steatite
more_info.products: Many dry products. Main use is in cosmetics.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E553 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Produced from several natural minerals.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E554 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Produced from several natural minerals.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E555 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Produced from several natural minerals.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E556 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Produced from the mineral willemite, also produced from siliciumoxide (quartz) and zinc oxide.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. 557 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: A natural type of clay from volcanic origin.
more_info.products: Fruit juices, aromas. Main use, however, is in cosmetics.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E558 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: A fine usually white clay formed by the weathering of aluminous minerals (such as feldspar).
more_info.products: Instant coffee, milk powder, aromas. Main use, however, is in cosmetics and pharmaceutical preparations (antacid).
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E559 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: A normal part of any fat. Commercially prepared from cottonseed oil, but animal origin can not be excluded.
more_info.products: Chewing gum, butter aroma/flavour, bakery products. Also used in cosmetics and pharmaceutical preparations.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: Although stearic acid and stearates are commercially obtained from plant sources, the use of animal fat (including pork and beef) can not be excluded. Only the producer can provide information on the origin. The use by vegans, vegetarians, Muslims, Jews and Hindus thus is not recommended.

more_info.origin: Ammonium salt of stearic acid, .
more_info.products: Sugar, but mainly used in cosmetics.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: Although stearic acid and stearates are commercially obtained from plant sources, the use of animal fat (including pork and beef) can not be excluded. Only the producer can provide information on the origin. The use by vegans, vegetarians, Muslims, Jews and Hindus thus is not recommended.

more_info.origin: Magnesium salt of stearic acid, .
more_info.products: Confectionary. Main use in cosmetics (baby powder)
more_info.dietary_restrictions: Although stearic acid and stearates are commercially obtained from plant sources, the use of animal fat (including pork and beef) can not be excluded. Only the producer can provide information on the origin. The use by vegans, vegetarians, Muslims, Jews and Hindus thus is not recommended.

more_info.origin: Aluminium salt of stearic acid, .
more_info.dietary_restrictions: Although stearic acid and stearates are commercially obtained from plant sources, the use of animal fat (including pork and beef) can not be excluded. Only the producer can provide information on the origin. The use by vegans, vegetarians, Muslims, Jews and Hindus thus is not recommended.

more_info.origin: Synthetic, or produced by fungi from sugar.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E574 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Synthetic, or produced by bacteria from sugar.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E575 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E576 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Potassium salt of gluconic acid, .
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E577 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Calcium salt of gluconic acid, .
more_info.products: Pudding powders, custard, canned vegetables, bakery products.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E578 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Iron salt of gluconic acid, .
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. E579 can be used by all religious groups, vegetarians and vegans.

more_info.origin: Iron salt of lactic acid, .
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None, lactic acid and lactates can be consumed by all religious groups, vegans and vegetarians. Although the name refers to milk, it is mot made from milk and thus suitable for people with milk allergy or lactose intolerance.
